scenes.description: 'Thanks for pitching in! But, why not take a break anyway? This seems manageable.' She smiles, glancing at [Bob].

options.text: You're right, Monica. I'll let you two handle it from here.

options.text: I appreciate that, but I want to ensure everything goes smoothly.

options.text: I'll help a bit longer, but let's coordinate the specifics first.
